meanings.definition: A scrap or morsel of food left after a meal.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, the dog eagerly devoured the ort that fell from the table.
meanings.sent2: She always made sure to clean up every ort from her plate.
meanings.sent3: The ort on his plate seemed to wink at him, daring him to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The ort of information she shared was enough to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The chef's special ort was a delightful surprise at the end of the meal.

meanings.definition: A small, insignificant remnant or leftover.
meanings.sent1: He found an ort of paper in his pocket from last week's project.
meanings.sent2: The ort of paint left in the can was not enough for another coat.
meanings.sent3: The ort of conversation they had was enough to break the awkward silence.
meanings.sent4: The ort of hope she clung to sustained her through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The ort of kindness he showed made a big impact on her day.
